document.id: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04797
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE REPEALING CHAPTER 5.148 OF TITLE 5 OF THE SAN MATEO COUNTY ORDINANCE CODE AND REPLACING IT WITH A NEW CHAPTER 5.148 TO REQUIRE A DISCRETIONARY, RATHER THAN MINISTERIAL, LICENSE TO ENGAGE IN COMMERCIAL CANNABIS CULTIVATION IN THE UNINCORPORATED AREA OF THE COUNTY OF SAN MATEO

citations.citation: County of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 04797
